p.01703376c4a81c0e9d91: Set the application theme or the theme of a given context
p.01703376c4a81c0e9d92:
This will change the appearance of the UI components in the context and its children contexts.

If `Context Tag` is provided, the theme will be assigned to this given context, otherwise the brick will set the theme for the entire App.
Optional: if provided, the theme will only be applied from the context of the given tag and downward. Otherwise, the theme will be applied at the application level.
Optoinal: if true, the action will be triggered only once a value has been provided to the theme property.
